name: Words of Magic
description:
Title: Words of Magic

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Puzzle, Adventure, Escape Room, Word Scramble

Rating: E 

Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: This game is an escape game type puzzle where the player has to decrypt hidden markings to find magical words that affect the environment around them

Instructions: Look around the area to find hidden markings to decrypt and unscramble words.

Game Design Team: Demonchu – Game Designer
